name: Supernova (itch) (geekdude)
description:
You are a hungry star who dreams of going supernova. Shoot solar flares at planets. They will slow down and drop into a lower orbit.  When they get close enough you consume them. Solar flares deplete your stars size. consuming planets increase your stars size. If you don't shoot a flare for awhile you will shoot occasionaly as you outgass. If your star becomes too small it becomes a black hole and you lose.

completed code I added to make planets gradually drop down to smaller orbits instead of jumping

Gamepad control added

fixed collision shape of sun. hopefully this helps the issue where its hard to tell when a planet is eaten.

This is a small game that was made in a weekend for a gamejam called Como Gamejam 3.
